title: Destinations Namespace Mapping

xdm:destinationID.title: Destination ID
xdm:destinationID.description: Unique Identifier for a destination instance

xdm:namespaceCode.title: Namespace Code
xdm:namespaceCode.description: This code is a human readable identifier for the namespace and can be used to request the technical namespace id which is used for identity graph processing.

xdm:adobeNamespace.title: Adobe Namespace
xdm:adobeNamespace.description: This is a human readable identifier for the namespace and can be used to request the technical namespace id which is used for identity graph processing.

xdm:sourceNamespace.title: Source Namespace
xdm:sourceNamespace.description: This is a human readable identifier for the source namespace and can be used to request the technical namespace id which is used for identity graph processing.

xdm:partnerNamespace.title: Partner Namespace
xdm:partnerNamespace.description: This is a human readable identifier for the partner namespace.

xdm:targetNamespace.title: Target Namespace
xdm:targetNamespace.description: This is a human readable identifier for the target namespace.

xdm:isMapped.title: Is Mapped
xdm:isMapped.description: This field specifies if the destination has the target namespace mapped.

xdm:createTime.title: Create Time
xdm:createTime.description: The date and UTC time when the activation flow to the destination-namespace mapping was createdByID

xdm:createdByID.title: Created User ID
xdm:createdByID.description: ID of user who created the destination flow
